name: Red Funeral
description:
Red Funeral is a visual demonstration of my meaning of the RayPunk style. This demo hasn't cool story or gameplay (optimization either), enjoy the view!

  • Gameplay: First Person Adventure
  • Story: You find yourself in a dark retrofuturistic city, its paranoid forms are your main enemy
  • Art style: RayPunk
  • Controls: W, A, S, D - movement, Shift - sprint, Ctrl - crouch, Space - jump
  • System requirements:
    Minimum:
    Videocard: Nvidia GTX 1070 8GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
    Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 / Intel Core i3 8100
    RAM: 16GB
    Storage: 3gb available space

    Recommended:
    Videocard: Nvidia RTX 3060 12GB / AMD Radeon RX 6600 8GB
    Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i5 10600
    RAM: 16GB
    Storage: 3gb available space
